Segment.name: Y4
Segment.comment: To transmit information relative to containers available for release

Field.name: BookingNumber1
Field.comment: Number assigned by the carrier for space reservation

Field.name: BookingNumber2
Field.comment: Number assigned by the carrier for space reservation

Field.name: Date
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: StandardPointLocationCode
Field.comment: Code (Standard Point Location) defined by National Motor Freight Tariff Association (NMFTA) or the Canadian Transportation Agency (CTA) point development group as the official code assigned to a city or point (for ratemaking purposes) within a city

Field.name: LocationIdentifier
Field.comment: Code which identifies a specific location

Field.name: TypeOfServiceCode
Field.comment: Code specifying extent of transportation service requested

SyntaxNote.name: P0809
SyntaxNote.comment: If either Y408 or Y409 is present, then the other is required.
